title: Stanzas Written in Dejection by Percy B Shelley

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Shelley uses contrasts to convey the speaker’s complex understanding of his situation.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Shelley uses contrasts to convey the speaker’s complex understanding of his situation.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
